DOC.criteria: inform consent meeting inclusion criterion hypotension hypertension treat untreated hypertension hypotension Severe systemic disorder ( tumor , tbc , diabetes , asthma etc ) diseases influence cardiovascular gastrointestinal system intake drug affect blood pressure and/or autonomic nervous system pregnancy lactation phase body mass index > = 32 cardiovascular risk factor ( diabetes , smoke ) drug alcohol abuse insufficient compliance participation another trial within last three month
